sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
His Majesties gracious letter to the meeting of the Estates of his ancient kingdom of Scotland William R. William III, King of England, 1650-1702. Scotland. Convention of Estates.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ..., Edinburgh : 1689.
Announces intent to form Scottish Parliament. At end of text: "Given at our court, at Hampton-Court, the seventeenth day of May, one thousand six hundred and eighty nine, and of our reign the first year". Broadside. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======

1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ..., Edinburgh : 1689.
Announces intent to form Scottish Parliament. At end of text: "Given at our court, at Hampton-Court, the seventeenth day of May, one thousand six hundred and eighty nine, and of our reign the first year". Broadside. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
the heir of Andrew Anderson
